sentences.english: Look , I am very haleness! You are a enmity fetch among innumerability. Foolish and clumsiness are your epitaph.

sentences.english: The second chapter is the epitaph's development at the beginning of Tang Dynasty.

sentences.english: Lemaire dates the object to 63 A.

sentences.english: Wit is the epitaph of an emotion. ----Nietzche.
Sacred hearts, epitaphs , touched by winds of change.

sentences.english: Epitaph set it as "Dr. Chen is both" person.

sentences.english: I want to actually try out on you a couple of epitaphs.
